snippet: A new visualization from NASA illustrates the concentration of carbon dioxide around the globe over the course of a year....
abstract: Visualization by NASA, based on satellite data, depicts seasonal movement and concentrations of carbon dioxide around globe.
lead_paragraph: A new visualization from NASA illustrates the concentration of carbon dioxide around the globe over the course of a year.

headline.main: Visualizing the Invisible Drivers of Climate Change
headline.print_headline: Ill Winds: Carbon Dioxide Whirls Across the Globe
